attributes.action: In order to trace all dogs within the EU, all dogs in the EU should be micro-chipped by vets & registered on line with a specified keeper & address
attributes.additional_details: This would facilitate to trace & identify stray dogs, buying and selling of dogs within the EU, as well as allowing certified rabid free dogs to travel within EU without need of being quarantined. Some specified dog keepers may be banned (& recorded online) by courts to be the registered keeper of certain dogs for a specified period of time. Irresponsible dog owners do play a part in a dog’s behaviour. Genetics, as well as the training/socialisation of a dog does play a part in determining whether a particular dog is dangerous or not. It is irresponsible to leave large dogs unsupervised with human babies. Dogs (as well as the owners) should be properly trained and excluded from potentially dangerous situations by their owners.
